languages.text: "Ты впервые прямо сказала, чего хочешь... Видеть тебя искренней — вот по-настоящему бесценный дар".
"That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
languages.original_text: "Ты впервые прямо сказала, чего хочешь... Видеть тебя искренней — вот по-настоящему бесценный дар".

traits.locale_text: "For the first time, you've told me what you really want. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
"For the first time, you've told me what you really want. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
"That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
"That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
"That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
"That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."

languages.text: «Esta es la primera vez que es sincera conmigo respecto a sus deseos. El auténtico regalo es ver su sinceridad».
languages.original_text: "That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."

traits.locale_text: «Esta es la primera vez que es sincera conmigo respecto a sus deseos. El auténtico regalo es ver su sinceridad».

languages.text: 「お前が自らの望みを正直に話してくれたのは、これが初めてだな。お前の誠実さを見ることができた。それはここでは、本当にかけがえのない贈り物だ」
languages.original_text: "That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が自らの望みを正直に話してくれたのは、これが初めてだな。お前の誠実さを見ることができた。それはここでは、本当にかけがえのない贈り物だ」

languages.text: “这还是你第一次坦诚地对我说出你的欲望。能看到你坦诚的一面，这才是真正的无价之宝。”
languages.original_text: "That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."

traits.locale_text: “这还是你第一次坦诚地对我说出你的欲望。能看到你坦诚的一面，这才是真正的无价之宝。”

languages.text: "Das war das erste Mal, dass Ihr ehrlich zu mir wart, was Eure Wünsche angeht. Eure Offenheit – ist hier das wahre unbezahlbare Geschenk."
languages.original_text: "That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."

traits.locale_text: "Das war das erste Mal, dass Ihr ehrlich zu mir wart, was Eure Wünsche angeht. Eure Offenheit – ist hier das wahre unbezahlbare Geschenk."

languages.text: « C'est la première fois que vous me parlez franchement de vos aspirations. Votre sincérité est en soi un cadeau inestimable. »
languages.original_text: "That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la première fois que vous me parlez franchement de vos aspirations. Votre sincérité est en soi un cadeau inestimable. »

languages.text: "Arzularına dair ilk defa bana karşı dürüst oldun. Samimiyetini görmek... İşte esas paha biçilmez hediye budur."
languages.original_text: "That is the first time you have been honest with me about your desires. To see your sincerity — that is the truly priceless gift here."
